title: Niort
extract:
Niort is a city in Deux-Sèvres, a department in the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region of western France.


Get in
1 Niort railway station (Gare de Niort).   (updated Jul 2021)


Get around


See
1 Donjon de Niort (Château de Niort). Medieval castle.   (updated Jul 2021)
 Maisonnay. one of the tallest radio masts in France.
